Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, fabric off-white in section, interior slightly grooved and spotted with a dark-coloured resinous deposit, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (108458) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/108458)
